thread.title: Gorgeous Bollywood Mom Kareena Kapoor Khan Is Back On Sets With A Bang
thread.title_full: Gorgeous Bollywood Mom Kareena Kapoor Khan Is Back On Sets With A Bang

author: Afsha Khan
title: Gorgeous Bollywood Mom Kareena Kapoor Khan Is Back On Sets With A Bang
text:
Gorgeous Bollywood Mom Kareena Kapoor Khan Is Back On Sets With A Bang 754 396 Kareena Kapoor Khan is the most glamorous mom in the B-town. Loading... 
This natural beauty is ruling Bollywood with her talent and style statement. Kareena chose to remain in the limelight during her pregnancy. Loading... 
This Bollywood mom looked damn adorable in her pregnancy pictures. Bebo is the proud mother of a cute baby Taimur Ali Khan. Loading... 
Just after a few months of delivering her first baby, Kareena chose to return back to work. This 36â€“year-old actress is back in action. Loading... 
Recently, Bebo was seen shooting at Mehboob Studios in Mumbai. Kareena is working in a commercial of jewellery brand. Loading... Mallika Bhat shared this picture on her Instagram account. Loading... 
Kareena is looking awesome as ever. I must say the actress is quite determined for her work. Loading... 
She has been giving mother goals from her pregnancy and has no plans of stopping anytime soon. This Bollywood mom's social media accounts are full of gorgeous pictures. Loading... 
I just can't help adoring her. Reports suggest that Bebo will soon start shooting for 'Veere Di Wedding' in May. Loading... 
I just can't wait to watch Kareena Kapoor Khan on the silver screen. You Go, Girl! 
Share this story with fans of Bebo around you. Loved this? Spread it out then
